text: It has always surprised me how little attention philosophers have paid to humor, since it is a more significant process of mind than reason. Reason can only sort out perceptions, but the humor process is involved in changing them.
author: Edward de Bono

text: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
author: Langston Hughes

text: But if you read Jane Austen, you know that she had a wicked sense of humor. Not only was she funny, but her early writing was very dark and had a gothic tone to it.
author: Seth Grahame-Smith

text: Even people that I agree with can do something that would be a target for a bit of humor.
author: Jonathan Shapiro

text: Humor is imperative, more important than food. You have a choice when someone dies. You can lie down or get back into life. Do something for someone else.
author: Doris Roberts

text: I really hate sitcoms on television with canned laughter and stuff. What really makes me laugh is the real-life stuff. I've got a dry sense of humor.

text: Humor is just another defense against the universe.
author: Mel Brooks

text: It's very hard to write humor.
author: Mark Strand

text: Humor helps ease the tension of race and the differences in society. If there wasn't comedy I don't know if Obama could have ever become president.
author: Marlon Wayans

text: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.
author: Gloria Allred

text: I suppose I miss the British cynicism and the humor.
author: Rod Stewart

text: Back in 2004, Kellie Overbey handed me her play 'Girl Talk' to read. I fell in love with her brutally delicious humor and the fearlessly deft way in which she drew her characters. They jumped off the page and begged me to give them a space in which to stomp around.
author: Carrie Preston

text: Alimony is like buying hay for a dead horse.
author: Groucho Marx

text: I think that some books are more successful than others to certain readers. People who read my books for the humor, they're going to love one book. People who read my books for the mystery, they might not like that book quite as much.
author: Janet Evanovich

text: Well, it's a humor strip, so my first responsibility has always been to entertain the reader... But if, in addition, I can help move readers to thought and judgment about issues that concern me, so much the better.
author: Garry Trudeau

text: Men love it. They have a sense of humor, whereas a lot of women are threatened or just don't get it.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

text: I regard the writing of humor as a supreme artistic challenge.
author: Herman Wouk

text: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
author: Eric Sevareid

text: When you meet someone new who instantly gets you, your sense of humor and your attitudes and your worldview, even if theirs are different - and you get them in return. You both talk and talk and agree and laugh and nod and yes, yes, of course you should get another round of drinks.
author: Erin Morgenstern

text: God has a most wicked sense of humor.
author: Maureen O'Hara

text: Sometimes a scene may be about one thing, and it may end up still being about that, but the emotionality of it comes from somewhere else, or the humor of it comes from somewhere else, and it gives it that real-life quality.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: There is also this benefit in brag, that the speaker is unconsciously expressing his own ideal. Humor him by all means, draw it all out, and hold him to it.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

text: Bands from Akron have a sense of humor and don't tend to take themselves too seriously.
author: Dan Auerbach

text: I've always been really dark, and drawn to darker humor. Nothing has been forced, and I don't say anything for shock value.
author: Amy Schumer

text: One of my favorite things about 'Star Trek' wasn't just the overt banter but the humor in that show about the relationships between the main characters and their reactions to the situations they would face there was a lot of comedy in that show without ever breaking its reality.

text: There are certain things I learned when I first started learning about acting, to try and place the character physically and emotionally. And the way you place them emotionally is often with humor.
author: David Duchovny

text: Confidence is at the root of so many attractive qualities, a sense of humor, a sense of style, a willingness to be who you are no matter what anyone else might think or say and it's true, I do have a certain fondness for women that have dark hair.
author: Wentworth Miller

text: There are different kinds of humor, some is sarcastic, some introspective. Introspective fit my personality better.
author: Rita Rudner

text: I am often the brunt of my own humor.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: Incongruity, they say, is one of the main ingredients of humor. Maybe it's because everybody can feel superior to me. I honestly don't know.
author: Emmett Kelly

text: But it also became the experience, or was the experience, of the writers who were attracted to this kind of humor. They're all men or women who come from the same kind of experience in their own lives.
author: Norman Lear

text: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving at different speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.
author: William James

text: Humor starts like a wildfire, but then continues on, smoldering, smoldering for years.
author: Robert Orben

text: Solutions-oriented campaigning with a little passion and a little humor I think that will go a long way. I think people are desperate for it.
author: Laura Ingraham

text: And for my family, comedically, that was the key to a lot of the humor.
author: Damon Wayans

text: We do not take humor seriously enough.
author: Konrad Lorenz

text: Sure, the comedians who swear or use scatological humor can get laughs, but they're uncomfortable laughs.
author: John Ratzenberger

text: Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
author: Allen Klein
